short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 4 convenient filters for reviewing work market applicants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide techs from the Work Market platform based on 4 filters: "No jobs", "No jobs with company", "Any abandoned jobs with company" and "any abandoned jobs". This can make browsing applicants 1000x faster in some cases!
